website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an addition to a collection of Harry Potter items, Minerva is a good choice for fans of all ages. The doll is especially appreciated by youngsters who love the detailed attire.
pros: Adorned with a pretty robe and hat that have precise detailing, just like those worn by Minerva from the Harry Potter series
Doll is just over 12 inches in height and has posable parts
cons: Complaint noted that the doll arrived in a padded envelop that didn't protect the box very well

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, Beautifully-Done Mature Doll
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this doll. Where to start? She’s an Original size Barbie doll and she has XL-sized feet so she’ll be sharing shoes with Wonder Woman, *but* the shoes she comes with are really cute. Her robe is gorgeous and very well made. I love that she’s multi-jointed for greater pose-ability. You can put her hair down but it’s cut very specifically to be worn up, so it looks cute in the front but wonky in back when worn down. Most of all, I love that Ms. Minerva is a beautiful older doll (she even has age details on her hands) that can be used as a mother or grandmother doll in your own Barbie world. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlar

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter Minerva Mcgonagall Doll
customer_reviews.text: Looks much like the character. The clothing is very nicely done...velvety fabric for the robe, rooted hair, and a very nice gift for a Harry Potter fan. Not too big, it fits on a shelf and can be displayed both in the box to keep it pristine, or out of the box, where one can adjust the hands and legs to let her sit on a shelf looking wise. Nice for kids of any age who like the series.
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Packaging opened
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these today and was so excited and then said “these boxes are open”. She got McGonnegal and Dumbledore. Both were opened and Dumbledore was taped. It seemed the toys were in tact but I don’t want to purchase a product that is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Happychick

customer_reviews.title: Mr.Potter.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought two copies of this doll for my work wife and I because they, why not? Little girls grow into women, but do we REALLY ever stop liking dolls? The bags under her eyes are SUPER authentic. I mean REALLY authentic. Very high quality doll!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Should be liked by Harry Potter fans
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves. Wants them all. Bought used. It say "product new, will come in original box, but different outer box". Which was accurate. When it arrived, the original package was opened, but there. (It looked like someone bought, took out, returned, repackaged with rubber bands. Since my daughter was not planning on leaving in box, this was not a issue. If you plan on leaving your collection unopened, I do not buy used.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate depiction of Dame Maggie Smith as Minerva Mcgonagle!
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little damaged but product was gor me, not a gift so no problem. Minerva is absolutely beautiful and her resemblance to Dame Maggie Smith is astounding. Fully poseable. I Have her sitting on an herb box on my altar. Albus Dumbledore will be sitting on the other box when he arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Meg McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: For the harry potter fans 🙂
customer_reviews.text: This is great for all the Harry potter fans out there! We looked around and couldn't find Minerva anywhere else. It's about 10$ more than at Walmart but we knew that as we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This is another realistic looking doll in the Harry Potter series. Minerva Mcgonagall looks like she did in the movie or close too. The outfit is pretty and looks right on. This is another doll from the series that I would buy and display.

customer_reviews.title: McGonagall doll is stunning!!!

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good likeness

customer_reviews.title: Great character

customer_reviews.title: Hard To FInd!
customer_reviews.text: We were so glad to find the Minerva doll! It made my granddaughter's birthday extra-special to get this gift. Doll has wonderful detail; looks JUST like Minerva in the movie; a great value. Was delivered promptly.

It is for an adult collection so it hasn't been opened as of yet but just looking at it from the outside it looks very nice.

customer_reviews.text: This doll is more than satisfactory. Features are fine and just as you might expect Minerva to look. Packaging is nice, and shows off doll. I plan to buy more in this series.

customer_reviews.text: Out of the Amazon shipping box the plastic front cover was completely unattached to the back cardboard on three sides. Luckily this is not a gift for anyone but myself and I had thought about opening all of my collection to display.

product_meta.title: Mattel Harry Potter Minerva MCGONAGALL Doll
product_meta.description: This film-inspired doll brings Harry Potter and his friends back to Hogwarts! Young fans can recreate their favorite scenes from the movies, or imagine their very own, with Harry Potter dolls. Professor McGonagall doll looks just like her character in the iconic film series and comes dressed in her signature robe and hat. With eleven "joints" -in the neck, shoulders, hips, knees, elbows and wrists -Professor McGonagall doll is ready for action storytelling and spellbinding poses! Doll comes with a personalized wand matching the one Professor McGonagall uses on screen -perfect for casting spells and inspiring imaginative play. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Fans and collectors alike will love recreating their favorite storylines from the movies and imagining their own!
Fun details, like her robe and hat, make Professor mcgonagall doll look just like her character in the celebrated Harry Potter film series
Includes a fashion based on the Hogwarts professor's signature look and a personalized wand that fans can use to help the seasoned witch cast spells and charms
Professor mcgonagall doll has eleven "joints" That allow for limitless posing possibilities and action storytelling on her Quest to help Harry defeat Lord Voldemort
Harry Potter and his friends are better together! Young fans can collect each of their favorite characters for even more fun and expanded play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars643 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
